game.name: Drill and Delve
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Subtitle Options, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You've been trapped in a mine. You'll need to use your tools to dig your way to the exit in a fully destructible 3D voxel terrain. Manage your oxygen and equipment, and uncover the dark mystery buried deep within the mine.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You've been trapped in a mine. You'll need to use your tools to dig your way to the exit in a fully destructible 3D voxel terrain. Manage your oxygen and equipment, and uncover the dark mystery buried deep within the mine.
